name: Winter GameJam 2020: Untitled Game
description:
Created by: Joëll Brink and Sven Sonneveld

Left-click to move as the drone

Right-click to interact  as the drone

use wasd or the arrow-keys to move and interact as scarfy

Music from: 

https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Daniel_Birch/indigo/daniel-birch-indigo-blocks made by Daniel Birch, CC-BY-NC

Minimalistic tileset from: 

https://opengameart.org/content/minimalist-pixel-tileset made by Blarget2, CC-BY 3.0

All other Sprites are made by Joëll Brink
